Synchronicity, an album by the English band The Police spawned many hit singles.

There is Every Breath You Take, which won the Grammys for the Song of the Year.

But for me the song that captures life more realistically is Synchronicity II.

Life of a working men with issues.

Facing problems

Daddy grips the wheel and stares alone into the distance\
He knows that something somewhere has to break\
He sees the family home now looming in his headlights\
The pain upstairs that makes his eyeballs ach
